text: Magenta rose is a color that is a representation of the color of a particular type of rose called a magenta rose, which can come in various tones of magenta or rose. The first recorded use of magenta rose as a color name in English was in 1927.Maerz and Paul A Dictionary of Color New York:1930--McGraw Hill Page 198; Color Sample of Magenta Rose: Page 129 Plate 53 Color Sample J11 (Note: the color shown as magenta rose in the color sample in Maerz and Paul is the color shown in the color chart above as deep magenta rose) == Meaning of magenta rose == * The color magenta rose represents the flower called a magenta rose. * The color magenta rose may represent Valentine's Day since the colors rose and magenta (as well as red) are used to represent Valentine's Day. Thus, the color magenta rose may represent romantic love. ==Comparison of pruple, magenta, rose and red== Name Color HEX Code Red Green Blue Hue Sat Lum Purple #800080 128 0 128 300° 100% 50% Magenta #FF00FF 255 0 255 300° 100% 100% Magenta Rose #FF00AF 255 0 175 319° 100% 100% Rose #7F00FF 255 0 127 330° 100% 100% Red #FF0000 255 0 0 0° 100% 100% ==Tones of magenta rose color comparison chart== *
